00048 /**
00049  * DMET3TestCaseCheck::DMET3TestCaseCheck
00050  * Synopsis: Default constructor.
00051  *
00052  * @param rte - the runtime environment
00053  * @param testCase - the DMET3TestCaseTableModel record being run
00054   * @param dmet3MarkerFile - the "generated" file.
00055  *
00056  */
00057 /*****************************************************************************/
00058 DMET3TestCaseCheck::DMET3TestCaseCheck(RunTimeEnvironment & rte,
00059                                        std::string testCase,
00060                                        std::vector< std::string > & testCaseRow,
00061                                        DMET3ReportTestCheckFiles & tcf)
00062   :  m_testCase(testCase) , m_testCaseRow(testCaseRow),  m_rte(rte), m_tcf(tcf)
00063 {
00064 
00065 
00066 }
00067 // end DMET3TestCaseCheck::DMET3TestCaseCheck
00068 /*****************************************************************************/
00069 /*****************************************************************************/
00070 /**
00071  * DMET3TestCaseCheck::check
00072  * Synopsis: virtual function from RegressionCheck. This routine compares
00073  * the results and expected results with test codes defined in the test case. 
00074  *
00075  * @param msg - to be returned the
00076  *
00077  * @return - true, if both files are identical. There is no epsilon.
00078  */
00079 /*****************************************************************************/
00080 bool DMET3TestCaseCheck::check(string & msg)
00081 {
00082 
00083   bool pass = true;
00084 
00085   msg = msg + string("| TEST CASE | ") + m_testCase + string(" | DESCRIPTION | ") + m_testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::LOG_MESSAGE];
00086 
00087   if ( m_testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::TEST_CODES].empty() ) {
00088     pass = checkAllColumns( msg ) && pass;
00089   }
00090   
00091 
00092   msg = msg + string("| TEST CASE | ") + m_testCase + string(" | END TEST CASE |" );
00093 
00094   Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION, msg );
00095     
00096   return pass;
00097 
00098 }
00099 // end DMET3TestCaseCheck::check
00100 /*****************************************************************************/
00101 /*****************************************************************************/
00102 /**
00103  * DMET3TestCaseCheck::checkAllColumns
00104  *
00105  * Helper function to check. The default test function where
00106  * all columns are checked for identical data. 
00107  * 
00108  *
00109  * @param msg - to be returned the
00110  *
00111  * @return - true, if both files are identical. There is no epsilon.
00112  */
00113 /*****************************************************************************/
00114 bool DMET3TestCaseCheck::checkAllColumns( string & msg ) {
00115 
00116   bool pass = true;
00117   bool okToContinue = true;
00118   
00119   map< int, stringstream *>      diffs;
00120   map< string, int >             diffStats;
00121 
00122   ComprehensiveReportTableModel expResults( m_rte, m_tcf.m_resultFiles["comprehensive"]);
00123 
00124   string testResultsFile = Fs::join(m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir,
00125                                     m_testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::BASE_NAME] + "_comprehensive.rpt");
00126 
00127   if (! Fs::isReadable(testResultsFile)) {
00128     APT_ERR_ABORT( testResultsFile + " file not found.");
00129   }
00130 
00131   ComprehensiveReportTableModel testResults( m_rte, testResultsFile );
00132 
00133   for ( int row = 0; (row < expResults.size() && okToContinue); row++ ) {
00134 
00135     // PROBE SET
00136     // If the probe sets don't match, we abandon ship.
00137     string expProbeSet = testResults.m_rows[row][ testResults.getColumnIndex("Probe Set ID")];
00138     string testProbeSet = testResults.m_rows[row][ testResults.getColumnIndex("Probe Set ID")];
00139 
00140       // NUMBER OF ROWS
00141       if ( row >= testResults.size() ) {
00142         diffs[row] = new stringstream();
00143         (*diffs[row]) << "### TEST STOPPED because test results end of table encountered at expected results row: " << row;
00144         okToContinue = false;
00145         pass = false;
00146         break;
00147       }
00148 
00149       if ( expProbeSet != testProbeSet ) {
00150       diffs[row] = new stringstream();
00151       (*diffs[row]) << "### TEST STOPPED because expected and test results have different probe sets: " << expProbeSet << " != " << testProbeSet;
00152       pass = false;
00153       okToContinue = false;
00154     }
00155 
00156     for ( int col = 0; (col < expResults.m_rows[row].size() && okToContinue);
00157                         col++ ) {
00158 
00159       if  (testResults.m_rows[row].size() <= col) {
00160         testResults.m_rows[row].push_back("");
00161       }
00162       if ( expResults.m_rows[row][col] != testResults.m_rows[row][col] ) {
00163         pass = false;
00164         if ( diffs.count(row) == 0 ) {
00165 
00166           diffs[row] = new stringstream();
00167 
00168           (*diffs[row]) << "### " << expResults.m_rows[row][ expResults.getColumnIndex("Gene")] << " | " << expProbeSet << " | ERRORS";
00169 
00170         }
00171         (*diffs[row]) << " | " << expResults.getColumnName(col) << ": expected \"" << expResults.m_rows[row][col] << "\" got \"" << testResults.m_rows[row][col] ;
00172         if ( testResults.m_rows[row][col].empty() ) {
00173           (*diffs[row]) << "EMPTY";
00174         }
00175         (*diffs[row]) << "\"";
00176       }
00177       
00178     }
00179 
00180   }
00181 
00182   if ( pass ) {
00183     msg = msg + " | PASSED";
00184     return pass;
00185   }
00186 
00187   msg = msg + string(" | FAILED Most likely reason : ") + m_testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::FAILED_MESSAGE] + string(" | ");
00188 
00189   stringstream summarySStr;
00190   summarySStr << endl;
00191   summarySStr << "--------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00192   summarySStr << "*** DMET3 REGRESSION ERROR REPORT *** \n";
00193   summarySStr << "Test Case: " << m_testCase << endl;
00194   summarySStr << "--------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00195   
00196   map< int, stringstream* >::iterator itISS;
00197 
00198   for (itISS = diffs.begin(); itISS != diffs.end(); itISS++) {
00199     summarySStr << (*itISS->second).str() << endl;
00200   }
00201 
00202   summarySStr << "--------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00203 
00204   msg = msg + summarySStr.str();
00205     
00206   return pass;
00207 
00208 }
00209 // DMET3TestCaseCheck::checkAllColumns
